#include <stdio.h>
int main()
{
        int t,a,j,b,c,k,l;
        scanf("%d",&l);
        t = l;
        while(t > 0) {
                a = t%10;
                if (a != 0 && l%a != 0)
                {
                        printf("Invalid\n");
                        break;
                }
                t = t/10;
        }
        if (t == 0)
                printf("Valid\n");
        return 0;
}
